name: predict_protein_disorder_regions
description: Predicts intrinsically disordered regions (IDRs) in a protein sequence using IUPred2A.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: protein_sequence
inputs.description: Protein sequence to analyze for disordered regions

inputs.name: output_file
inputs.description: Output file path for results (default: disorder_prediction_results.csv)
